Do You Really Want to Exit out of Application?
Paring is complete.\nPlease touch the OK button.
Press the Start button on your blood pressure monitor until you see Pr on the screen. The pairing process will begin shortly after
Press the button on the bottom of your scale until you see Pr on the scale\'s screen. The pairing process will begin shortly after
Press the button on your thermometer until you see an L on the screen. Press the button again to begin pairing to your mobile device. You will see a Pr on the screen while pairing
Ensure Bluetooth is turned on for your device.
